name: Headout, Inc.
description: Developer of an on-demand mobile marketplace designed to help travelers discover and book experiences and tours and to offer reliable and quality services in a fragmented industry. The company's marketplace helps to discover activities and events happening in town at a discounted prices, enabling travelers to find local experiences at the last minute.
